languages.title: Languages
languages.description: Comma-separated list of lang codes to filter export to (preferably ISO 639-1, else ISO 639-3) Defaults to all

formats.title: Formats
formats.description: Comma-separated list of formats to filter export to (epub, html, pdf, all) Defaults to all

zim_file.title: ZIM Filename
zim_file.description: Custom ZIM filename; computed from ZIM Name otherwise.

zim_title.title: Title
zim_title.description: Custom title for your project and ZIM.

zim_languages.title: ZIM Languages
zim_languages.description: ZIM Language metadata; comma separated ISO-639-3 language codes expected

books.title: Books
books.description: Filter to only specific books ; separated by commas, or dashes for intervals. Defaults to all

concurrency.title: Concurrency
concurrency.description: Number of concurrent threads to use

title_search.title: Title search
title_search.description: Search by title feature (⚠️ does not scale)

no_index.title: No Full-text Index
no_index.description: Do not create ZIM with full-text index

lcc_shelves.title: Library of Congress Shelves
lcc_shelves.description: Comma-separated list of LCC shelf codes to include (e.g., P,PR,Q). Use 'all' to generate all shelves. If omitted, no shelf filtering.

stats_filename.title: Stats filename
stats_filename.description: Scraping progress file. Leave it as `/output/task_progress.json`

output.title: Output folder
output.description: Output folder for ZIM file(s). Leave it as `/output`

mirror_url.title: Mirror URL
mirror_url.description: URL to a specific Gutenberg mirror to use
